long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The users should install the extension if they want the channel points from Twitch Channel to be collected automatically.

This extension collects automatically all the channel points from Twitch streaming that appears each 10-15 minutes when you are watching.

The extension is an automation to click on the green gift button to collect the points on the Twitch stream channel.
